requests.name: Get all Forms
requests.description:
Returns a list of all forms existing on the system under the merchant of the signed in user.

Note: Currently no pagination supported.

requests.name: Get CSV of Feedback Timeline
requests.description:
Returns a S3 link to the timeline of the merchant in the CSV format.

Same rules apply to **nps_score_start**, **nps_score_end**, **start_date**, **end_date** as in "dashboard/timeline"

**form_id** is the ID of the form whose CSV is required. Currently only a single form's CSV can be exported.

requests.name: SignUp Request Form
requests.description: This is when a customer requests to sign up from the dashboard.

requests.name: Create Instance
requests.description: Creates an instance for the form specified with the form ID.

requests.name: Get Feedback Timeline
requests.description:
Returns a paginated timeline of all the feedbacks received till date.

**start_date** & **end_date** should be in the form "YYYY-MM-DD"

**nps_score_start** && **nps_score_end** should be between 1 to 10.

**form_ids** are comma separated list of forms whose according to which feedbacks in the timeline need to be sorted.

requests.name: Check User Credentials
requests.description:
Check the credentials of an InGage User. Currently every merchant just has a single user attached to it.

Currently Basic Authentication is supported. So credentials need to be provided in the 'Authorization' Header.

requests.name: Create a Form
requests.description:
Create a new Feedback Form.

**incremental_id** is a boolean which will decide if the feedbacks got on this form will produce a unique incremental ID starting with 0.

requests.name: Get all instance under a Form
requests.description: Returns the list of all instances which exist under a particular feedback form.

requests.name: Get a single Form Details.
requests.description: Returns the details of a single feedback form. Currently all these details are also being returned in "/dashboard/forms" endpoint.

requests.name: Get a single Instance details.
requests.description:
Returns the details of a single instance existing under a form.

Both Form and Instance are specified by their respective IDs in the URL.

requests.name: Get Form Analytics
requests.description:
Returns the analytics (no. of questions answered and choices made on those) of a particular form.

**start_date** & **end_date** should be in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". 

**instance_ids** are the instances whose analytics are required.
